Fuengirola.title: Fuengirola
Fuengirola.byline: Fuengirola is a city in the Costa del Sol in southern Spain that is popular with tourists for its long sandy beach and malécon.

Fuerteventura.title: Fuerteventura
Fuerteventura.byline: Fuerteventura is one of the islands that makes up the Canary Islands (Spanish: Las Islas Canarias).
